name: Ivan Coronado
coverLetter: Hello, my name is Ivan Coronado, I am currently residing in California but I am in the process of relocating to Medford, Oregon. I will be ready to start working on November 8th, when I am in Oregon I will be having reliable transportation to get to work. I am a very hard worker and willing to learn whatever is necessary to get the job done. I have already applied for my marijuana worker permit and I have already received my application ID through an email. After reviewing my resume I hope that you can see that I am the candidate that you are looking for. I look forward to hearing from you so that I can elaborate more about how my skills can help benefit your organization. Please contact me at 559-288-9674 to arrange for a good meeting time, I will be in the Medford area on the 16th and 17th of next week. Thank you.
contact: Please contact me at 559-288-9674 or ivancoronado0317@gmail.com
